_88safeString.description: a string safe to use for loadName / namespace. Lowercase-only.

___brandId.description: An array of manufacture numbers pertaining to a given labware

___groups.description: Logical well groupings for metadata/display purposes; changes in groups do not affect protocol execution

___wells.description: An array of wells that contain the same metadata

___brandId.description: An array of manufacture numbers pertaining to a given labware

___brand.description: Brand data for the well group (e.g. for tubes)

___metadata.description: Metadata specific to a grid of wells in a labware

___displayCategory.description: Label(s) used in UI to categorize well groups

___displayName.description: User-readable name for the well group

___wellBottomShape.description: Bottom shape of the well for UI purposes

$eref.description: a string safe to use for loadName / namespace. Lowercase-only.

___version.description: Version of the labware definition itself (eg myPlate v1/v2/v3). An incrementing integer

___ordering.description: Generated array that keeps track of how wells should be ordered in a labware

___schemaVersion.description: Which schema version a labware is using

___cornerOffsetFromSlot.description: Distance from left-front-bottom corner of slot to left-front-bottom corner of labware bounding box. Used for labware that spans multiple slots. For labware that does not span multiple slots, x/y/z should all be zero.

___parameters.description: Internal describers used to determine pipette movement to labware

___format.description: Property to determine compatibility with multichannel pipette

___isMagneticModuleCompatible.description: Flag marking whether a labware is compatible by default with the Magnetic Module

$eref.description: a string safe to use for loadName / namespace. Lowercase-only.

___loadName.description: Name used to reference a labware definition

___magneticModuleEngageHeight.description: Distance to move magnetic module magnets to engage

___tipLength.description: Required if labware is tiprack, specifies length of tip from drawing or as measured with calipers

___isTiprack.description: Flag marking whether a labware is a tiprack or not

___tipOverlap.description: Required if labware is tiprack, specifies the length of the area of the tip that overlaps the nozzle of the pipette

___quirks.description: Property to classify a specific behavior this labware should have

___brandId.description: An array of manufacture numbers pertaining to a given labware

___brand.description: Real-world labware that the definition is modeled from and/or compatible with

___shape.description: If 'rectangular', use xDimension and yDimension; if 'circular' use diameter

___x.description: x location of center-bottom of well in reference to left-front-bottom of labware

___y.description: y location of center-bottom of well in reference to left-front-bottom of labware

___z.description: z location of center-bottom of well in reference to left-front-bottom of labware

___totalLiquidVolume.description: Total well, tube, or tip volume in microliters

___wells.description: Unordered object of well objects with position and dimensional information

___metadata.description: Properties used for search and display

___displayCategory.description: Label(s) used in UI to categorize labware

___tags.description: List of descriptions for a given labware

___displayName.description: Easy to remember name of labware
